definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
to get rid of/to put aside/to reject/to keep control/to hold (one's breath)

sentences.english: After visiting the five famous mountains, let's step down to visit the Peacock Showing Its Tail.
sentences.chinese: 看了五大名山，我们一起往下走，光临孔雀开屏。

sentences.english: I always wait for it to open its tail.
The peacock displayed its fine tail feathers when it noticed bright colours.
sentences.chinese: 孔雀看到鲜艳的颜色就开屏。

sentences.english: The only regret is that there is no wonder that the peacock.
sentences.chinese: 唯一遗憾的就是没有看到孔雀开屏的奇观。

definition: Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
(bird species of China) Siberian crane (Grus leucogeranus)
